text: Jan Skopeček (19 September 1925 - 27 July 2020) was a Czech actor and playwright. == Early life and career == He was born in Litoměřice, Czechoslovakia. Skopeček began his acting career in 1949, appearing in a number of plays. He was married to actress Věra Tichánková. The two remained together until Tichánková's death in January 2014. He died on 27 July 2020 in Prague, aged 94.Zemřel herec Jan Skopeček ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Czech actors Category:Czech playwrights
title: Jan Skopeček
